name: photon
description: Build cross platform desktop apps with PromethiumJS and Go

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.dev-webview: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev-webview"
scripts.build-webview: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build-webview
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && go mod tidy
